column4: hello... I have one question about Wine... I was configing wine and I was stupid... so I accidentally got the display resolution from 96 dpi to 481dpi... making too big... and impossible to read... and becuz I can't scroll down... I can't now change the settings... is there any other way so I can restore default graphics setting...?
I just tried uninstall and reinstall... and then I did use winecfg... it is too big too scroll down...
try removing the .wine directory in your home directory
